int  face,

Definition at line 1122 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References Echange_impose_base::h_imp(), and DoubleVect::size().

{
  // C.L de type Echange_externe_impose : 1/h_total = (1/h_imp) + (e/diffusivite)
  // La C.L fournit h_imp ; il faut calculer e/diffusivite

  double e,h_total_inv;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  //  int j = elem(face,1);
  //  int ori = orientation(face);
  int k;
  if (DERIVED_T::IS_MODIF_DEQ)
    {
      e = ind_Fluctu_Term()==1 ? Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face) :
          equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face);
    }
  else
    {
      e = DERIVED_T::IS_DEQUIV ? equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face) :
          Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face);
    }
  if (i != -1)
    {
      //      e = la_zone->xv(face,ori) - la_zone->xp(i,ori);
      for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
        {
          const int l = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : k;
          h_total_inv =  1/la_cl.h_imp(face-num1,k) + e/nu_2(i,l);
          aii(k) = surface(face)/h_total_inv;
        }
      for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
        ajj(k) = 0;
    }
  else
    {
      //e = la_zone->xp(j,ori) - la_zone->xv(face,ori);
      for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
        {
          const int l = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : k;
          h_total_inv = 1/la_cl.h_imp(face-num1,k) + e/nu_2(elem_(face,1),l);
          ajj(k) = surface(face)/h_total_inv;
        }
      for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
        aii(k) = 0;
    }
}

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  double d0 = la_zone->dist_face_elem0_period(face,i,la_cl.distance());
  double d1 = la_zone->dist_face_elem1_period(face,j,la_cl.distance());

void Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem< DERIVED_T >::coeffs_face ( int  boundary_index,

Definition at line 452 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References Echange_impose_base::h_imp().

{
  // C.L de type Echange_externe_impose : 1/h_total = (1/h_imp) + (e/diffusivite)
  // La C.L fournit h_imp ; il faut calculer e/diffusivite

  double h_total_inv;
  double h_imp = la_cl.h_imp(face-num1);
  double e;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  //  int j = elem(face,1);

  if (DERIVED_T::IS_MODIF_DEQ)
    {
      e = ind_Fluctu_Term()==1 ? Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face) :
          equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face);
    }
  else
    {
      e = DERIVED_T::IS_DEQUIV ? equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face) :
          Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face);
    }

  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;
  double heq;

  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (nu_2(i,ori) == 0.0)
        {
          heq = h_imp; // Should be 0 ??
        }
      else
        {
          h_total_inv =  1.0/h_imp + e/nu_2(i,ori);
          heq = 1.0 / h_total_inv;
        }

      aii = heq*surface(face);
      ajj = 0;
    }
  else
    {
      if (nu_2(elem_(face,1),ori) == 0.0)
        {
          heq = h_imp; // Should be 0 ??
        }
      else
        {
          h_total_inv =  1.0/h_imp + e/nu_2(elem_(face,1),ori);
          heq = 1.0 / h_total_inv;
        }

      ajj = heq*surface(face);
      aii = 0;
    }
}

Definition at line 863 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References DoubleVect::size().

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  // int j = elem(face,1);
  double dist = Dist_norm_bord(face);

  if (i != -1)
    {
      for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
        aii(k) = surface(face)*porosite(face)*nu_1(i,k)/dist;
      for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
        ajj(k) = 0;
    }
  else  // j != -1
    {
      for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
        ajj(k) = surface(face)*(porosite(face)*nu_1(elem_(face,1),k))/dist;
      for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
        aii(k) = 0;
    }
}

    {

      if (DERIVED_T::IS_QUASI)
        {
          //TODO : implement when Diff_K_Eps_QC is templatized

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  double d0 = la_zone->dist_face_elem0_period(face,i,la_cl.distance());
  double d1 = la_zone->dist_face_elem1_period(face,j,la_cl.distance());

Definition at line 342 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  //  int j = elem(face,1);
  double dist = Dist_norm_bord(face);
  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;

  if (i != -1)
    {
      aii =  porosite(face)*nu_1(i,ori)*surface(face)/dist;
      ajj = 0;
    }
  else   // j != -1
    {
      ajj =  porosite(face)*nu_1(elem_(face,1),ori)*surface(face)/dist;
      aii = 0;
    }
}

Definition at line 1439 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References DoubleVect::size().

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  double d0 = Dist_face_elem0(face,i);
  double d1 = Dist_face_elem1(face,j);
  double heq;
  for ( k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
    {
      int l = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : k;

      if (nu_1(i,l)==0.0 && nu_2(j,l)==0.0)
        {
          heq = 0.;
        }
      else
        {
          assert(nu_1(i,l)!=0.0);
          assert(nu_2(j,l)!=0.0);
          heq = compute_heq(d0,i,d1,j,l);
        }
      aii(k) = heq*surface(face)*porosite(face);
      ajj(k) = heq*surface(face)*porosite(face);
    }
}
template<typename DERIVED_T >
void Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem< DERIVED_T >::coeffs_faces_interne ( int  face,

) const [inline]

Definition at line 777 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  double d0 = Dist_face_elem0(face,i);
  double d1 = Dist_face_elem1(face,j);
  double heq;
  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;

  if (nu_1(i,ori)==0.0 && nu_2(j,ori)==0.0)
    {
      heq = 0.;
    }
  else
    {
      assert(nu_1(i,ori)!=0.0);
      assert(nu_2(j,ori)!=0.0);
      heq = compute_heq(d0,i,d1,j,ori);
    }
  aii = ajj = heq*surface(face)*porosite(face);
}

Definition at line 313 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References Dirichlet::val_imp().

{
  double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  // Olga avait mis :
  // double dist = 2*Dist_norm_bord(face);
  // Pierre dit que :
  double dist = Dist_norm_bord(face);
  double flux;
  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;

  if (n0 != -1)
    {
      flux = (T_imp-inco[n0])*surface(face)/dist;
      flux *= (porosite(face)*nu_1(n0,ori));
    }
  else   // n1 != -1
    {
      flux = (inco[n1]-T_imp)*surface(face)/dist;
      flux*= (porosite(face)*nu_1(n1,ori));
    }
  return flux;
}

References Echange_impose_base::h_imp(), and Echange_impose_base::T_ext().

{
  // C.L de type Echange_externe_impose : 1/h_total = (1/h_imp) + (e/diffusivite)
  // La C.L fournit h_imp ; il faut calculer e/diffusivite

  double h_total_inv;
  double h_imp = la_cl.h_imp(face-num1);
  double T_ext = la_cl.T_ext(face-num1);
  double e;
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
//  Dist_norm_bord_externe(boundary_index,face,local_face);
  if (DERIVED_T::IS_MODIF_DEQ)
    {
      e = ind_Fluctu_Term()==1 ? Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face) :
          equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face);
    }
  else
    {
      e = DERIVED_T::IS_DEQUIV ? equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face) :
          Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face);
    }

  double flux, heq;
  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;

  // XXX : E. Saikali 08/03/2021
  // The test of a zero diffusion was not done before. I think it should be like that
  // See always when we use int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO....
  if (n0 != -1)
    {
      // XXX : Attention for DIFT OPERATORS : nu_2 and not nu_1 (only laminar part)
      if (nu_2(n0,ori) == 0.0)
        {
          heq = h_imp; // Should be 0 ??
        }
      else
        {
          h_total_inv = 1.0/h_imp + e/nu_2(n0,ori);
          heq = 1.0 / h_total_inv;
        }
      flux = heq*(T_ext - inco[n0])*surface(face);
    }
  else
    {
      if (nu_2(n1,ori) == 0.0)
        {
          heq = h_imp; // Should be 0 ??
        }
      else
        {
          h_total_inv = 1.0/h_imp + e/nu_2(n1,ori);
          heq = 1.0 / h_total_inv;
        }
      flux = heq*(inco[n1] - T_ext)*surface(face);
    }
  return flux;
}

      assert(nu_1(n0,ori)!=0.0);
      assert(nu_1(n1,ori)!=0.0);
      heq = compute_heq(d0,n0,d1,n1,ori);
    }
  flux = heq*(inco[n1] - inco[n0])*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  return flux;
}
template<typename DERIVED_T >
void Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem< DERIVED_T >::flux_faces_interne ( const DoubleTab &  inco,
int  face,
DoubleVect &  flux 
) const [inline]

Definition at line 1406 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References Cerr, Process::exit(), finl, and DoubleVect::size().

{
  if (DERIVED_T::IS_QUASI)
    {
      //TODO : implement when Diff_K_Eps_QC is templatized
      Cerr << "Diff_K_Eps_QC are not templatized yet !" << finl;
      Process::exit();
    }
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  double d0 = Dist_face_elem0(face,n0);
  double d1 = Dist_face_elem1(face,n1);
  double heq;
  for (int k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
    {
      const int l = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : k;

      if (nu_1(n0, l) == 0.0 && nu_1(n1, l) == 0.0)
        heq = 0.;
      else
        {
          assert(nu_1(n0, l)!=0.0);
          assert(nu_1(n1, l)!=0.0);
          heq = compute_heq(d0, n0, d1, n1, l);
        }
      flux(k) = heq*(inco(n1,k) - inco(n0,k))*surface(face)*porosite(face);
    }
}

template<typename DERIVED_T >
double Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem< DERIVED_T >::secmem_face ( int  boundary_index,
int  face,
int  local_face,
const Echange_externe_impose &  la_cl,
int  num1 
) const [inline]

Definition at line 512 of file Eval_Diff_VDF_Elem.h.

References Echange_impose_base::h_imp(), and Echange_impose_base::T_ext().

{
  // C.L de type Echange_externe_impose : 1/h_total = (1/h_imp) + (e/diffusivite)
  // La C.L fournit h_imp ; il faut calculer e/diffusivite

  double h_total_inv;
  double h_imp = la_cl.h_imp(face-num1);
  double T_ext = la_cl.T_ext(face-num1);
  double e;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  //  int j = elem(face,1);

  if (DERIVED_T::IS_MODIF_DEQ)
    {
      e = ind_Fluctu_Term()==1 ? Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face) :
          equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face);
    }
  else
    {
      e = DERIVED_T::IS_DEQUIV ? equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face) :
          Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face);
    }

  double flux, heq;
  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;

  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (nu_2(i,ori) == 0.0)
        {
          heq = h_imp; // Should be 0 ??
        }
      else
        {
          h_total_inv = 1.0/h_imp + e/nu_2(i,ori);
          heq = 1.0 / h_total_inv;
        }

      flux = heq*T_ext*surface(face);
    }
  else
    {
      if (nu_2(elem_(face,1),ori) == 0.0)
        {
          heq = h_imp; // Should be 0 ??
        }
      else
        {
          h_total_inv = 1.0/h_imp + e/nu_2(elem_(face,1),ori);
          heq = 1.0 / h_total_inv;
        }

      flux = - heq*T_ext*surface(face);
    }
  return flux;
}

  // La C.L fournit h_imp ; il faut calculer e/diffusivite

  //  int j = elem(face,1);
  //  int ori = orientation(face);

    {
      e = ind_Fluctu_Term()==1 ? Dist_norm_bord_externe_(face) :
          equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face);

      e = DERIVED_T::IS_DEQUIV ? equivalent_distance(boundary_index,local_face) :

{
  double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  //  int j = elem(face,1);
  double dist = Dist_norm_bord(face);
  double flux;
  int ori = DERIVED_T::IS_ANISO ? orientation(face) : 0;

  if (i != -1)
    {
      flux = T_imp*surface(face)/dist;
      flux *= porosite(face)*nu_1(i,ori);
    }
  else   // j != -1
    {
      flux = -T_imp*surface(face)/dist;
      flux *= (porosite(face)*nu_1(elem_(face,1),ori));
    }

  return flux;
}
